Name: pixark
Overview: This Docker will download and install SteamCMD. It will also install PIXARK and run it (a normal server startup of PIXARK can take a long time!).

game_id.Name: GAME_ID
game_id.Description:
The GAME_ID that the container download at startup.
(https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Dedicated_Servers_List)

steam-username.Name: Steam-Username
steam-username.Description: Your Steam username goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

validateinstallation.Name: Validate Installation
validateinstallation.Description: Set the Variable to 'true' if you want to validate the installation otherwise leave it blank.

steam-password.Name: Steam-Password
steam-password.Description: Your Steam password goes here if you want to install a game that needs a valid account, otherwise leave it blank (ATTENTION: You have to disable Steam Guard).

servername.Name: Server Name
servername.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

serverpassword.Name: Server Password
serverpassword.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

serveradminpassword.Name: Server Admin Password
serveradminpassword.Description: Leave empty if you want to use the settings from GameUserSettings.ini (this field accepts no spaces)

gameparameters.Name: Game Parameters
gameparameters.Description: Enter your game parameters seperated with ? and start with a ? (don't put spaces in between eg: ?MaxPlayers=40?FastDecayUnsnappedCoreStructures=true)

extragameparameters.Name: Extra Game Parameters
extragameparameters.Description: Type in your Extra Game Parameters seperated with a space and - (eg: -DisableDeathSpectator -UseBattlEye)

udp1-gameport.Name: UDP1 - Game Port
udp1-gameport.Description: UDP Game Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number

udp2-cubeport.Name: UDP2 - Cube Port
udp2-cubeport.Description: UDP Cube Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number

udp3-queryport.Name: UDP3 - Query Port
udp3-queryport.Description: UDP Query Port (if you need another port, please delete this entry and create a new UDP Port with the required port number, also don't forget to click an 'Show more settings ...' and change the port number
